mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into agent_profit_settings (agent_id, pay_channel_id, trade_type, percent, floor_number, created_at, updated_at, trade_type_id) values (#{agentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payChannelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tradeType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{percent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{floorNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tradeTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update agent_profit_settings set agent_id = #{agentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_channel_id = #{payChannelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trade_type = #{tradeType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, percent = #{percent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, floor_number = #{floorNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, trade_type_id = #{tradeTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, agent_id, pay_channel_id, trade_type, percent, floor_number, created_at, updated_at, trade_type_id from agent_profit_settings where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, agent_id, pay_channel_id, trade_type, percent, floor_number, created_at, updated_at, trade_type_id from agent_profit_settings

select id, agent_id, pay_channel_id, trade_type, percent, floor_number, created_at, updated_at, trade_type_id from agent_profit_settings where agent_id=#{param1} and pay_channel_id=#{param2} and trade_type_id=#{param3} and floor_number<=#{param4} order by floor_number desc limit 0,1
